Buff2_Description: While {c_important}{u}Fortified{/u}{/c} over 50% of your Maximum Health, your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills deal increased damage.
desc: While you have {c_important}{u}Fortify{/u}{/c} for over [{SF_1}*100|%|] of your Maximum Life, your {c_important}Earth{/c} Skills deal {c_number}[{SF_0} * 100|%x|]{/c} increased damage.
name: Stone Guard
